bug.author: GuillaumeDSM
bug.description:
ERROR | RESTExchange - binance | Failed to get recent trade binance GET <denchmark-link:https://api.binance.com/api/v1/aggTrades?symbol=ETHBTC&limit=50>https://api.binance.com/api/v1/aggTrades?symbol=ETHBTC&limit=50</denchmark-link>
is happening regularly and is flooding error logs suggestion => handle exception via second chance try
